definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
Aum Shinrikyo (or Supreme Truth), the Japanese death cult responsible for the 1995 sarin gas attack on the Tokyo subway
Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3
containing_words.word: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

definition: Ministry of Truth, a fictional ministry from George Orwell's novel Nineteen Eighty-Four

sentences.english: Non-truth derived from the nature of truth, is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 非真理源出于真理的本质，是不可避免的。

sentences.english: Non-truth derived from the nature of truth, is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 非真理源出于真理的本质，是不可避免的。

sentences.english: When you sit, be the stronghold of truth.
sentences.chinese: 当你坐着时，要做真理的保垒。

sentences.english: Like lions we tow the line, blood-sewn pact with truth inside.
sentences.chinese: 我们像狮子一样拖行，血缝制协定真理内。

sentences.english: Only social practice can be the criterion of truth.
sentences.chinese: 真理的标准只能是社会的实践。

sentences.english: Doubts about this eternal truth come because of the wavering Mind.
sentences.chinese: 对此永恒真理会产生怀疑是因为心念摇摆不定。

sentences.english: Mistakes live in the neighbourhood of truth and therefore delude us.
sentences.chinese: 错误与真理毗邻而居，所以会迷惑我们。

sentences.english: All truths have to be acquired directly by the individual.
sentences.chinese: 所有真理都要被每个个人直接获得。

sentences.english: And if it's taken as the whole truth, and nothing but the truth,it's detrimental.
sentences.chinese: 如果把这当作全部的真理，则是有害的。

sentences.english: Because we cannot accept the truth of transience, we suffer.
sentences.chinese: 我们无法接受瞬息万变这一真理，因此我们为之痛苦。

sentences.english: Truth will stand without a prop.
Practice is the sole criterion of truth.
sentences.chinese: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准。

sentences.english: Suffering with truth decay? Brush up on your Bible.
sentences.chinese: 心中的真理被蛀蚀了吗？用你的圣经刷掉吧。

sentences.english: A recent experience re-taught me this truth.
sentences.chinese: 最近的经历让我重新认识到这个真理。

sentences.english: Hume referred to the latter type of axioms as "self-evident" truths.
sentences.chinese: 休谟提到的“不言自明的”真理公理后一种类型。

sentences.english: The question of the truth becomes the question of practice.
sentences.chinese: 真理的问题本质上是实践的闯题。

definition: theism (the belief in the existence of God)
